SecuritiesHolding.name: SecuritiesHolding
SecuritiesHolding.description: Represents the securities associated with an insurance policy.

AssetCategoryName.description: The market capitalization and investing style.

AssetClass.description: The major category of asset type.

FinancialAccountId.description: The financial account associated with the securities holding.

FinancialSecurityId.description: The financial security associated with the securities holding.

GainLoss.description: Change in the value of this holding since its purchase.

HouseholdId.description: The household this holding rolls up to.

InsurancePolicyId.description: The insurance policy this holding is related to.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastUpdated.description: The timestamp for when data for this holding was last updated by an external data source.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MarketValue.description: The current market value of this holding.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PercentChange.description: The percent change in the value of this holding since its purchase.

PrimaryOwnerId.description: The primary owner of this holding.

PurchasePrice.description: Price per share at the time of purchase.

Sector.description: Group of related or common stocks.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system. This field is unique within your organization.
